nl.tue.id.oocsi.client.data

Class OOCSIDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.id.oocsi.client.data.OOCSIDevice

  • public class OOCSIDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    OOCSIDevice allows to configure one or more devices for an OOCSI client that can be recognized by HomeAssistant (and the OOCSI server) and will then be displayed or treated otherwise in a semantically correct way. Tbc.
    Author:
    matsfunk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      create a new OOCSI device
